name: JSONSchema
description: This demonstrates the flexibility of JSON Schema by documenting itself.  This schema describes the expected name/value pairs in any JSON Schema.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: definitions for each of the name/value pairs expected in the JSON structure the schema describes

fields.name: name
fields.description: the name of the field - When used to describe possible values in an array, name should be omitted.

fields.name: type
fields.description: JSON value type expected for the the property's value, indicate multiple types by separating values with a space

fields.name: description
fields.description: description of what this field and its value are for

fields.name: fields
fields.description: only valid for "object" and "array" value types - an array of definitions for each of the name/value pairs expected in the field's structure
